duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize expertise in family law to handle a diverse range of cases.
Manage and oversee legal files, ensuring all necessary documentation is accurate and up to date.
Conduct legal research and analysis to support clients' cases effectively.
Prepare and draft legal documents, including contracts, agreements, and court pleadings.
Represent clients in various legal proceedings, including hearings, negotiations, and mediations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Law or related field (Juris Doctor preferred)
State Bar Admission in good standing
